title: "Goal of this action is to inspire more confidence in cryptocurrencies"
body: One of the oldest IT companies in the world, IBM, conducts research on cryptocurrency fully based on the US dollar. The company became interested in the Stronghold project, whose main goal is price stabilization and covering in the official currency of the United States.
gallery: Cryptocurrency is secured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp., and IBM will check how to use it on your own IBM Blockchain platform. "The goal of this action is to inspire more confidence in cryptocurrencies and increase its usability based on the technical advantages of blockchain, a decentralized, secure and transparent database," commentators noticed.
